Amazon.com: Stone Harbor Hardware: Bathroom Hardware
s: The Stone Harbor Hardware brand features a number of unique bathroom collections that include grab bars, towel bars or rings, paper holders, and robe hooks. Some of the collections that Stone Harbor Hardware offers include Barrington, Cambridge, Harbor Mist, Laredo, Portland, Vienna, and Zurich.

t: About Us
s: Established in 2010, Stone Harbor Hardware LLC manufactures and distributes quality hardware for an exceptional value. The Stone Harbor brand covers six essential areas: door locks, door hinges and hardware, bath hardware, cabinet hardware, closet hardware and builders hardware.

t: Stone Harbor Products - Complete Home Hardware
